Question
========

Answerlist
----------
* $N*\sum(M_{Tj}-M_{grand})^{2}$
* $\sum(X_{ij}-M_{grand})^{2}$
* $\sum(X_{ij}-M_{PiTj})^{2}$

Solution

* Correct
